name: AsterVoid (Altrix Studios)
description:
Originally created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 42.

AsterVoid is an Asteroids-style game with a twist: each destroyed asteroid leaves behind a "void" in space that you can't fly through. Dodge the asteroids and the ever-growing void, and try and rack up a high-score!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Z: Select/Fire
  • X: Back
